title: CSS Border Properties
description: CSS border properties fully compliant with CSS specifications

borderWidth.description: Sets the width of all four borders

borderStyle.description: Sets the line style of all four borders

borderColor.description: Sets the color of all four borders

borderTop.description: Shorthand for border-top-width, border-top-style, and border-top-color

borderRight.description: Shorthand for border-right-width, border-right-style, and border-right-color

borderBottom.description: Shorthand for border-bottom-width, border-bottom-style, and border-bottom-color

borderLeft.description: Shorthand for border-left-width, border-left-style, and border-left-color

borderTopWidth.description: Sets the width of the top border

borderRightWidth.description: Sets the width of the right border

borderBottomWidth.description: Sets the width of the bottom border

borderLeftWidth.description: Sets the width of the left border

borderTopStyle.description: Sets the line style of the top border

borderRightStyle.description: Sets the line style of the right border

borderBottomStyle.description: Sets the line style of the bottom border

borderLeftStyle.description: Sets the line style of the left border

borderTopColor.description: Sets the color of the top border

borderRightColor.description: Sets the color of the right border

borderBottomColor.description: Sets the color of the bottom border

borderLeftColor.description: Sets the color of the left border

borderRadius.description: Rounds the corners of an element's border

borderTopLeftRadius.description: Rounds the top-left corner of an element's border

borderTopRightRadius.description: Rounds the top-right corner of an element's border

borderBottomLeftRadius.description: Rounds the bottom-left corner of an element's border

borderBottomRightRadius.description: Rounds the bottom-right corner of an element's border

borderImage.description: Shorthand for border-image-source, border-image-slice, border-image-width, border-image-outset, and border-image-repeat

borderImageSource.description: Specifies the image to use as a border

borderImageSlice.description: Divides the border image into regions

borderImageWidth.description: Sets the width of the border image

borderImageOutset.description: Sets the distance by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

borderImageRepeat.description: Defines how the edge regions of the border image are sampled and tiled
